PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05732010-05-13NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Class II Nuclear Facilities and Prescribed Equipment Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CLASS II NUCLEAR FACILITIES AND PRESCRIBED EQUIPMENT REGULATIONS, in order to formalize the current regulatory practice of an approval process for prospective Radiation Safety Officers (RSOs) of service providers of Class II prescribed equipment and of Class II nuclear facilities, to ensure that RSOs are adequately qualified and trained to perform their duties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0107 Publication Date: 2010-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
